spreadsheetId.title: Spreadsheet id
spreadsheetId.description: Id of the spreadsheet from where the old data will be loaded

datasetOrExecutionId.title: Dataset or crawler execution id
datasetOrExecutionId.description: Dataset or crawler execution id where the new data will be loaded from

limit.title: Limit items
limit.description: Number of items to take from the dataset or crawler execution. Default is up to 250000 for datasets and 100000 for crawlers.

offset.title: Offset items
offset.description: Number of items to skip from the dataset or crawler execution. Default is 0.

filterByField.title: Filter by field
filterByField.description: Field that should be unique for the item to be inserted as a row. Cannot be used together with other filter options.

filterByEquality.title: Filter by equality
filterByEquality.description: If on, item will be imported if its fields are not all equal to other item in the spreadsheet or dataset. Cannot be used together with other filter options.

transformFunction.title: Transform function
transformFunction.description: Custom function that will take new items and old items arrays as parameters and produces final array that will be imported.  Cannot be used together with other filter options. For more info, check the docs.

tokensStore.title: Google OAuth tokens store
tokensStore.description: Key-value store where your Google OAuth tokens will be stored so you don't have to authorize every time again. By default it is google-oauth-tokens

createBackup.title: Create backup
createBackup.description: Old rows from your spreadsheet will be saved to the default key-value store before importing new rows.
